thread.title: FT Portfolios Canada Co. Announces Cash Distribution for Its Exchange Traded Funds

author: cnbc.com
title: FT Portfolios Canada Co. Announces Cash Distribution for Its Exchange Traded Funds
text:
TORONTO, March 20, 2018 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) --
(TSX:FUD) (TSX:FUD.A) (TSX:FDE) (TSX:FDE.A) (TSX:FSL) (TSX:FSL.A) (TSX:EUR) (TSX:EUR.A) (TSX:FSD) (TSX:FSD.A) (TSX:FST) (TSX:FST.A) (TSX:FTB) (TSX:ETP) (TSX:ETP.A) (TSX:FHF) (TSX:FHD) (TSX:FHC) (TSX:FHC.F) (TSX:FHM) (TSX:FHG) (TSX:FHG.F) (TSX:FHU) (TSX:FHQ) (TSX:FHQ.F)
FT Portfolios Canada Co. (“First Trust”) is pleased to announce cash distribution for its Exchange Traded Funds (the “ETFS”) listed on the Toronto Stock Exchange for the period ending March 31, 2018.
The cash distributions are payable on April 6, 2018 to Unitholders of record on March 29, 2018 with an ex-dividend date of March 28, 2018. Details for the per unit distribution amounts are shown below:
Fund Name Fund Ticker Cash Distribution Amount First Trust Value Line® Dividend Index ETF (CAD-Hedged) FUD $0.0450 FUD.A $0.0200 First Trust AlphaDEX TM Emerging Market Dividend ETF (CAD-Hedged) FDE $0.0350 FDE.A $0.0185 First Trust Senior Loan ETF (CAD-Hedged) FSL $0.0636 FSL.A $0.0555 First Trust AlphaDEX TM European Dividend Index ETF (CAD-Hedged) EUR $0.0500 EUR.A $0.0288 First Trust Short Duration High Yield Bond ETF (CAD-Hedged) FSD $0.0850 FSD.A $0.0670 First Trust Global Risk Managed Income Index ETF ETP $0.0650 ETP.A $0.0560 First Trust AlphaDEX TM U.S. Consumer Staples Sector Index ETF FHC $0.0255 FHC.F $0.0200 First Trust AlphaDEX TM U.S. Industrials Sector Index ETF FHG $0.0250 FHG.F $0.0170 First Trust AlphaDEX TM U.S. Financial Sector Index ETF FHF $0.0555 First Trust AlphaDEX TM U.S. Technology Sector Index ETF
FHQ $0.0650 FHQ.F $0.0400 First Trust Tactical Bond Index ETF FTB $0.0600 First Trust Canadian Capital Strength ETF FST $0.0600 FST.A $0.0250 First Trust AlphaDEX TM U.S. Consumer Discretionary Sector Index ETF FHD $0.0700 First Trust AlphaDEX TM U.S. Materials Sector Index ETF FHM $0.0550 First Trust AlphaDEX TM U.S. Utilities Sector Index ETF FHU $0.1100
For further information, please contact: FT Portfolios Canada Co.
416-865-8065/877-622-5552
